Age Limit (as on 01-07-2022)

  • Minimum Age Limit: 18 Years
  • Maximum Age limit for Local to AP & Also Working in AP Police Dept: 34 Years
  • i.e., must have been born not earlier than 02-07-1988 and not later than 01-07-2004
  • Maximum Age Limit for Others: 26 Years
  • i.e., must have been born not earlier than 02-07-1996 and not later than 01-07-2004
  • Maximum Age Limit for Widows/ Divorced Women/ Woman Judicially separated from her husband of SC & ST Categories: 42 Years
  • i.e., must have been born not earlier than 02-07-1980 and not later than 01-07-2004
  • Widows/ Divorced Women/ Woman Judicially separated from her husband (Others): 37 Years
  • i.e., must have been born not earlier than 02-07-1985 and not later than 01-07-2004
  • Age Relaxation is Applicable as per Rules.

Qualification (as on 01-07-2022)

For Both Post Codes: 21 & 23

  • For All Candidates: Candidate Should Posses Intermediate or Its Equivalent.
  • For SC/ ST Candidates: Candidate Should Posses SSC or Its Equivalent.

Physical Standards

Physical Measurements Test (PMT)

For all Candidates: 

i)Men: For Post Code No: 21 & 23

  • Height: Must not be less than 167.6 CMS
  • Chest: Must not be less than 86.3 CMS Round the chest on full inspiration with a minimum expansion of 5 CMS

ii)Women: For the Post Code No: 21

  • Height: Must not be less than 152.5 CMS
  • Weight: Must not be less than 40 Kgs

For ST & Aboriginal Tribes of Srikakulam, Vizianagaram, Vishakapatnam, East Godavari & West Godavari:

i)Men: For the Post Code No: 21 & 23

  • Height: Must not be less than 160 CMS
  • Chest: Must not be less than 80 CMS Round the chest on full inspiration with a minimum expansion of 3 CMS

ii)Women: For the Post Code No: 21

  • Height: Must not be less than 150 CMS
  • Weight: Must not be less than 38 Kgs

Physical Efficiency Test (PET)

Kerala.intro: Kerala Pareeksha Bhavan has announced notification for the recruitment of Teachers (Kerala TET November 2024) vacancy. Those Candidates who are interested in the vacancy details & completed all eligibility criteria can read the Notification & Apply online.
Kerala.contentHtml:
Name of the Post: Kerala TET November 2024 Online Form

Post Date: 07-11-2024

Latest Update: 21-11-2024

Brief Information: Kerala Pareeksha Bhavan has announced notification for the recruitment of Teachers (Kerala TET November 2024) vacancy. Those Candidates who are interested in the vacancy details & completed all eligibility criteria can read the Notification & Apply online.

Kerala Pareeksha Bhavan

Kerala TET November 2024

WWW.FREEJOBALERT.COM

Download Mobile App

Application Fee

  • For Each Category: Rs. 500/-
  • For SC/ ST/ Differently Abled Candidates: Rs. 250/- 
  • Payment Mode: Through Net Banking, Credit/ Debit Card)

Important Dates

  • Starting Date to Apply Online: 11-11-2024
  • Last Date to Apply Online & Payment Off Fee: 25-11-2024
  • Date of Application Corrections: Available from 21-11-2024 
  • Last Date for Printout of Application: 20-11-2024
  • Date for Download Admit Card : 08-01-2025
  • Date of Exam : 18-01-2025 & 19-01-2025

Age Limit

  • There is no age limit to apply for KTET 2024 Exam.
  • Refer notification for more details.

Qualification

For Paper/ Category 1 – Lower Primary Classes (Class 1-5):

  • 12th/ 10+2 (or it’s equivalent) with a minimum of 45% marks. Also must have passed the Trained Teachers Certificate or Diploma in Education (TTC/D.Ed/DLEd) 
  • Higher Secondary/ Senior Secondary (or it’s equivalent) with at least 45% marks and 2-year Diploma in Education (Special Education).
  • 12th/ 10+2 (or it’s equivalent) with at least 50% marks along with qualifying 2-year diploma in elementary education
  • 12th/ 10+2 (or it’s equivalent) with at least 50% marks and a degree in 4 years Bachelor of Elementary Education (B.El.Ed.)

For Paper/ Category II – Upper Primary Classes (Class 6-8)

  • B.Ed. Two-year Diploma/TTC/ D.Ed/ D.L.Ed in Elementary Education along with any other eligible degree to apply for the course. Must pass.
    Otherwise
    B.Ed with 45% marks. Bachelor in Education (B.Ed)/DLEd qualification along with any eligible degree (NCTE will be applicable) to apply for the course. Rules issued from time to time
    Otherwise
    4 years Bachelor in Elementary Education (B.El.Ed) with pass in Higher Secondary/Senior Secondary (Equivalent) with 50% marks
    Otherwise
    4 years B.Sc/BA in Education (BA.Ed Or B.Sc.Ed) with pass in Higher Secondary/Senior Secondary (Equivalent) with 50% marks.
    Otherwise
    BBA degree awarded or recognized by universities in Kerala if other qualifications are required to write K.TET Category 2.12
    Final year students of D.Ed/D.El.Ed and B.Ed can also apply. While applying for K.TET, a certificate from the head of the institution that you are a 2nd year student must be produced.

Paper/ Category III – High School Classes (Class 9-12)

  • Graduation with BA/ BSc/ B.Com degree securing at least 45% marks along with a B.Ed.
  • Degree in the subject concerned with MSc.Ed. Degree.

Paper/ Category IV – Language Teachers

  • Candidates, possessing a Certificate/ Diploma/ Degree in teaching in any subject, and are approved by Universities/ NCTE/ Board of Examinations/ Government of Kerala, are eligible to apply.
  • Those candidates who have acquired qualifications for the posts of Language Teachers of Arabic, Hindi, Sanskrit & Urdu (up to Upper Primary level), Specialist teachers & Physical Education teachers as mentioned in Chapter XXXI of Kerala Education Act And Rules can apply for Kerala TET 2024 Paper IV.

For more Qualification Details Refer the notification.

Those Candidates who are interested in the vacancy details & completed all eligibility criteria can read the Notification & Apply Online.

J&K Services Selection Board (JKSSB)

Advt No. 02 of 2024

Sub-Inspector Vacancy 2024

WWW.FREEJOBALERT.COM

Download Mobile App
Application Fee

  • For all others: Rs. 700/-
  • For SC/ ST-1/ ST-2 & EWS Category: Rs. 600/-
  • Payment Mode: Through Online mode viz. Net Banking, Credit or Debit Cards.

Important Dates

  • Starting Date for Apply Online & payment of Fee: 03-12-2024
  • Last Date for Apply Online & Payment of Fee: 02-01-2025

Age Limit (as on 01-01-2024)

  • Minimum Age limit for all Candidates: 18 Years
  • Maximum Age Limit for OM/ SC/ ST-1/ ST-2/ RBA/ ALC/ IB/ OBC/ EWS/ Government Service/ Contractual Employment Candidates: 28 Years (candidates should be born between 01-01-1996 to 01-01-2006)
  • Maximum Age Limit for In-Service Police Personnel Candidates: 30 Years (candidates should be born between 01-01-1994 to 01-01-2006)
  • Every Ex-Servicemen having served in the Armed Forces shall be allowed to deduct the period of such Service from his Actual Age and if the Resultant Age does not exceed the maximum age limit prescribed for the post by more than 3 years, he shall be deemed to satisfy the condition regarding Age Limit: Candidate should not be born after 01-01-2006.

Physical Standards

For PST:

For Males:

  • Height: 5′-6″ (minimum)
  • Chest girth: 32″ (unexpanded)
  • Chest girth: 33 ½” (expanded)

For Females:

  • Height: 5’2″ (minimum)
  • Provided that for candidates belonging to the Gorkha Community/Bot Tribe, the minimum Height shall be relaxable by 2″.

For PET:

For Male candidates:

  • Long Race: 1600 meters in 6 ½ minutes (Six minutes thirty seconds)
  • Pushups: 20 (one cycle of up and down to be counted as one)

For Female candidates:

  • Long Race: 1000 meters in 6 ½ minutes (Six minutes thirty seconds)
  • Shot Put (4Kgs): 14 ½ feet in three attempts.
  • For more details refer the notification.

Physical Standards

  • Height : Except in Case of Women Candidates : Less than 168 cms
  • Chest : Less than  81 cms and inflated less than 86 Cm with a minimum 5 Cm. expansion of  Chest Shall be deemed to Physically fit
  • The Height & Weight of Women Candidates of Any Category Shall not be Less than 152 cms & Weight 47.5 kgs respectively, except Saharia Candidates
  • The Height of Garhwali & Gurkha Candidates Shall not be Less than 160 cms and their deflated & inflated  Chest must not be less than 79 cms and 84 Cm, respectively
  • For More Details Refer the Notification. 

Qualification

  • Candidates should possess B.Sc. (Physics & Mathematics) or B.E/B.Tech (Telecommunication/ Electronics/ Electrical Engg)
  • Working knowledge of Hindi written in Devnagri Script and knowledge of Rajasthani Culture.
